Enable Comment/Reply/Upvote only when user is loggedin.

If user is not logged in, disable Comment menu, and reply/upvote of
context menu in Comments activity.

HN Lists

Various HN lists:
* news:        Default (front page)
* best:        Highest voted recent links
* active:      Most active current discussions
* noobstories: Submissions from new accounts

The implementation is not elegant (like the rest of codebase), and the
icon isn't relevant.

Optimizations

Cosmetics
Completely new theme
Splitted between two other layouts
Move to the top when user changes the page
Setting SDK level 4 (android 1.6) as the minimum requirement
Bundling preferences images
Preventing NullPointerException if there's some connectivity issue
Simplifying stuff a tad
Drop out of Comments activity, if uh, well, there's no comment

Add newline and html entities support to comments
Unlicensing

Bumping version and getting ready for the bugfix release

Fix a crash by filtering out job adverts

Job adverts have their subtext tag empty. This caused the application to
crash. This commit removes all items with an empty subtext tag.
